name: Santet Island Disharmony
description:
This is the demo version of Santet Island Disharmony. This game include an fully playable early level of Santet Island Disharmony, the Forest, with 32  droppable items, 1 Mysterious Mage (Shopkeeper), & 1 playable character (Sage Apprentice). Almost all of the elements are randomly-generated, so you can play over and over again to get different experience in each run.

You can check out & consider to become one of our backer on our Kickstarter Page at https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/sragenndesostudio/santet-island-disharmony. By become our backer, you will make the full version of Santet Island Disharmony come closer to reality.
